content.question: Which of the following explains a similarity among reactions to the characteristics of immigration in the late 1800s described in the poem and reactions to earlier immigration to the United States?

choices.label: Social Darwinists argued that competition among immigrant workers would benefit the economy.
Reformers sought to assist immigrants in maintaining the traditional cultures of their home countries.
Religious leaders urged Americans to embrace the religious diversity created by Catholic immigrants.
Nativists advocated that the government should reduce the power of immigrant voters in elections.

content.answer: Nativists advocated that the government should reduce the power of immigrant voters in elections.

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
